tool.name: A query from History pane
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool searches MEDLINE abstract(s).
LUCENE 2.4.0 has been used to index and search MEDLINE abstracts that are included in 2009 MEDLINE/PubMed Baseline Distribution.
-----
**How to use**
Please select queries listed in the History pane, and click the execute button.
If there is no Pasted Entry in the History pane, please use "Upload File" under "Get Data" in Tools pane to upload a query/queries to the History pane, or please use the MEDLINE search with a dirct-input query.
The results can be shown on the middle pane by clicking the eye symbol on the history pane.
-----
**Output**
PMID{tab}Title
